com.magnet.web.core.spi

Interface StandardWebContainerConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.magnet.config.api.EnableableConfiguration
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JettyConfigBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.magnet.web.core.spi.impl.AbstractWebContainerConfig, JettyService.DefaultConfigBean

    public interface StandardWebContainerConfig
extends com.magnet.config.api.EnableableConfiguration
    The standard web container configuration elements.

      • isSslEnabled

        @Optional
@Description(value="The container will run with SSL if this is set to true, the SSL configuration details are to be specified in SslConfigBean.")
boolean isSslEnabled()
